title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
description: Deuce Bigalow is a less than attractive, down on his luck aquarium cleaner. One day he wrecks the house of a gigolo and needs quick money to repair it. The only way he can make it is to become a gigolo himself, taking on an unusual mix of female clients. He encounters a couple of problems, though. He falls in love with one of his unusual clients, and a sleazy police officer is hot on his trail.

reviews.text: Not a great comedy, but still good one to spend your time with. I've seen better from Rob Schneider.
Deuce Bigalow is a hilarious movie. It might not be the smartest film but it has some of the funniest lines to date. Rob Schneider is great along with all the other characters.

Silly, perhaps, but Rob Schneider is such a likable actor that it really doesn't matter and this is a very funny film. As long as you don't sit there taking it too seriously and laugh along at some pretty out there jokes then you will have a good time, but you will need to 'get' Schneider's comedy in order to enjoy it. It's also a clever concept too I think of an Average Joe taking over the role of a Gigolo and he pulls it off perfectly, so if you're in need of a good chuckle look no further
One of the laugh out loud comedies from 1999, following in in the footsteps of Austin Powers 2 & Big Daddy also released that year.
Rob Schneider, I don't care if you are friends with Adam Sandler, there are many more comedians more deserving (and more funny) to have the their own movie than you.
A hilarious concept with great acting from Rob.
Hur hur hur - funny! The sort of movie that is great if you don't expect anything from a movie but easy humor that you can watch while also surfing the net.

Ignore the square reviewers - they must be glum booring people that need to relax and learn to enjoy a good funny film! This is a laugh a minute film and I would reccomend it to any bloke - and some women, although my wife seemed to think it was in poor taste! That has got to be a selling feature !!!
Would probably rank as one of the all time worst movies, if it weren't for its sequel.

When Deuce Bigalow is fired from his job cleaning fish tanks, he meets a male prostitute that asks him to care for his fish whilst he is away. When he breaks an expensive fish tank, he finds himself working as a gigolo to pay for the damages. It’s hard to fathom quite why this was such a big hit at the box office as, despite the best efforts of Rob Schneider, the tired old jokes very quickly become rather grating.

My Family and I absolutely love this Rob Schneider Movie.We love that the movie Makes fun of one man’s misery, that he has to turn to Prostitution to make some money, in a short period of time.And the Characters he meets, are very special in their own way.
I miss movie like this, where we could just laugh. I remember to be in the movies with just a few people and almost pissed myself from many laughters.
I love this movie. When it first came out I never seen anything like it. It's so hilarious. The worst gigolo ever!
